concept.title: Fumble Frenzy: Pigskin Pursuit
concept.description: In Fumble Frenzy, you are a determined, albeit slightly clumsy, foodball player racing against time and a hungry horde to score the ultimate touchdown. Navigate chaotic arenas, outsmart ravenous rivals, and gobble up power-ups to achieve culinary glory!
concept.theme: Whimsical, food-themed football arena with a touch of arcade chaos.
concept.objective: Score a touchdown by carrying the 'Pigskin' (a delicious, oversized pastry) to the opponent's end zone while evading a variety of food-themed enemies.
mechanics: Top-down movement and directional control of the player character.
Throwing/passing mechanic: Player can throw the Pigskin to a teammate (AI) or a designated target zone.
Tackle/Dodge mechanic: Player can perform a short-range tackle to momentarily stun enemies or a dodge roll to evade attacks.
player_abilities: Dash: A quick burst of speed to close distance or escape danger.
Pigskin Toss: The core mechanic of throwing the Pigskin, with varying accuracy and range.
Fumble Recovery: A chance-based mechanic where a dropped Pigskin can be quickly picked up again.

enemies.name: Hungry Hamburglar
enemies.behavior: Patrols a set path, attempting to intercept the player. Will chase if player is in line of sight.

enemies.name: Spicy Sausage
enemies.behavior: Rolls directly towards the player when spotted, attempting to knock them down.

enemies.name: Gooey Gummy Bear
enemies.behavior: Slow-moving but leaves sticky patches on the ground, slowing the player if they step on them. Attempts to grab the Pigskin.

enemies.name: Boss: The Great Pizza Pie
enemies.behavior: A large, stationary boss that spits pizza slices and creates small pepperoni hazards. Must be 'tackled' multiple times to progress.

powerups.name: Whipped Cream Shield
powerups.effect: Grants temporary invulnerability to enemy contact and projectiles.

powerups.name: Extra Cheese Toss
powerups.effect: Allows for a more powerful, homing Pigskin throw for a limited time.

concept.level_progression: Levels are structured as increasingly challenging football arenas with unique layouts and enemy compositions. Each level culminates in a boss encounter or a timed scoring challenge. Unlocking new arenas and harder difficulties as the player progresses.
concept.scoring_system: Primary scoring is achieved by successfully carrying the Pigskin into the end zone (Touchdown = 6 points). Bonus points are awarded for collecting dropped Pigskins (Fumble Recovery = 2 points), stunning multiple enemies with a single tackle (Combo Tackle = 1 point per enemy), and for completing levels within a certain time limit.
concept.visual_style: Vibrant, cartoony 2D graphics with chunky, appetizing food designs. Environments are brightly colored and stylized, resembling a fantastical food-themed stadium. Smooth, fluid character animations with a slightly exaggerated, comedic feel.
concept.sound_theme: Upbeat, catchy chiptune music with a driving arcade feel. Sound effects are satisfying and often exaggerated, with comical 'splats', 'boings', and 'chomps'. Crowd cheers and stadium ambiance add to the energetic atmosphere.

level_design.name: The Rookie Ruckus
level_design.description: Welcome to Fumble Frenzy! Your first challenge is to navigate a small, open field, learning the basics of movement and passing. Dodge the initial few blockers and secure the pigskin to reach the endzone!
